pieces.text:
CLANCY,

NEVER FORGET THE CRIES OF YOUR PEOPLE
NEVER FORGET THE RAW FEAR THE FUELED YOU, OR THE
REBELS THAT MADE YOU WHO YOU ARE TODAY.
WE ARE AL​L ONE
WE DESTROYED THEM SO THAT WE DIDN'T BECOME THEM
WE MUST DO BET​TER, CLANCY
WE MUST DO BET​TER.

TB

Hilt,
Do you ever stare at the horizon, wondering what it would look like without Dema's silhouette? An unending line of beauty, uninterrupted by the system that polluted us. What would it have been like to have been born out here and never forced into living so [...]
